actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the screening and counseling of Americans with respect to Tay-Sachs disease.
short_title: National Tay-Sachs Disease Screening and Counseling Act

summary.text: National Tay-Sachs Disease Screening and Counseling Act - Amends title XI of the Public health Service Act (Genetic Diseases, Hemophilia Programs, and Sudden Infant Death Syndrome) to authorize the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to and contracts with public and nonprofit entities for projects for establishing and operating voluntary Tay-Sachs disease screening and counseling programs, primarily through other existing health programs.

titles.title: National Tay-Sachs Disease Screening and Counseling Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the screening and counseling of Americans with respect to Tay-Sachs disease.
